thread.title: Shilpa Shetty Styled Her Off-Shoulder In The Most Unique Way
thread.title_full: Shilpa Shetty Styled Her Off-Shoulder In The Most Unique Way

author: Natasha Patel
title: Shilpa Shetty Styled Her Off-Shoulder In The Most Unique Way

persons.name: shilpa shetty kundra  shilpa shetty kundra

text:
Natasha Patel Mar . 15 . 2017 Shilpa Shetty Kundra 
Shilpa Shetty Kundra ‘s looking red hot and we ain’t surprised one bit. For her appearance on Indian Idol yesterday, she wore a beautiful number by Amoh by Jade that included an off-shoulder lace top with the most unusual, yet stylish pairing. 
With a benarasi draped skirt, Shilpa looked AMAZING! The gold detailing on the skirt didn’t stop stylist, Sanjana Batra from taking the look to cooler places by pushing all the fashion limits—accessorised with a silver coin-chain choker. Shilpa Shetty Kundra 
She completed the look with neutral jootis and a perfect blow-dry! 30 TAGS
